duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the implementation process for new and modified labor standards in warehouse operations.
Support regional operations projects in warehouse automation, facility layout, and labor incentive plans.
Train warehouse and delivery staff in efficient work methods and maintain work standards.
Perform process simulations to assess the impact on labor productivity and incentive programs.
Serve as a subject matter expert in work methods, efficiency techniques, and labor management software.
Monitor and analyze warehouse and delivery operations to measure productivity and identify efficiency opportunities.
Maintain high-level relationships with vendors throughout the implementation process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, required (Industrial Engineering degree preferred)
